Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.javaoop.movie_booking_app.controller.AdminController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
Controller class to handle administrative actions related to movies, showtimes, and bookings.

This controller provides endpoints under the "/admin" path to:

  • View and manage movies (activate/deactivate)
  • View, add, edit showtimes for movies
  • View and update booking statuses

Access to this controller should be restricted to admin users.

      Displays the admin homepage listing all movies.
      Parameters:
      model - Spring MVC model to add attributes for the view.
      Returns:
      The view name "admin_home" to render.

    • adminMovie

      @GetMapping("/movie/{id}") public String adminMovie(@PathVariable("id") Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Displays the management page for a specific movie.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the movie to manage.
      model - Spring MVC model to add attributes for the view.
      redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes for passing flash attributes.
      Returns:
      The view name "admin_movie" if movie exists, otherwise redirects to admin home.

    • adminControlMovie

      @PostMapping("/movie/{id}") public String adminControlMovie(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestParam(name="active",required=false) String activeParam, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Updates the activation status of a movie.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the movie to update.
      activeParam - Optional parameter indicating whether the movie should be active.
      redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes for passing success or error messages.
      Returns:
      Redirects back to the movie management page.

    • adminGetShowtime

      Shows the page for managing showtimes of a specific movie.
      Parameters:

      model - Spring MVC model to add attributes for the view.
      redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes for passing error messages.
      Returns:
      The view name "admin_movie_showtime" if successful, otherwise redirects to admin home.

    • adminAddShowTime

      @PostMapping("/movie/{id}/showtime") public String adminAddShowTime(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @Valid @ModelAttribute("new_showtime") @Valid ShowtimeDto showtimeDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles the creation of a new showtime for a specific movie.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the movie to add a showtime to.
      showtimeDto - DTO containing new showtime details.
      bindingResult - Result of validation on showtimeDto.
      redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes for passing success or error messages.
      Returns:
      Redirects back to the showtime management page.

    • adminEditShowtime

      @GetMapping("/showtime/{showtimeId}") public String adminEditShowtime(@PathVariable("showtimeId") Long showtimeId, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Loads the showtime edit form for a given showtime ID.
      Parameters:
      showtimeId - The ID of the showtime to edit.
      model - Spring MVC model to add attributes for the view.
      redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes for passing error messages.
      Returns:
      The view name "admin_showtime" if showtime found, otherwise redirects to admin home.

    • adminUpdateShowtime

      @PostMapping("/showtime/{id}") public String adminUpdateShowtime(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @Valid @ModelAttribute("showtimeForm") @Valid ShowtimeDto showtimeDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Updates an existing showtime with new data.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the showtime to update.
      showtimeDto - DTO containing updated showtime details.
      bindingResult - Result of validation on showtimeDto.
      redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes for passing success or error messages.
      Returns:
      Redirects to showtime list for the associated movie on success, or admin home on error.

    • handleStatusUpdate

      @PostMapping("/booking") public String handleStatusUpdate(@RequestParam("bookingId") Long bookingId, @RequestParam("status") BookingStatus status, @RequestParam("showtimeId") Optional<Long> showtimeId, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles booking status update from admin side.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to update.
      status - The new booking status to set.
      showtimeId - Optional showtime ID to redirect after update.
      redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes for passing success or error messages.
      Returns:
      Redirects to booking list or booking list filtered by showtime.

    • adminListBookings

      @GetMapping("/booking") public String adminListBookings(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays all bookings in the system.
      Parameters:
      model - Spring MVC model to add attributes for the view.
      Returns:
      The view name "admin_booking" to render.

    • adminListBookingsByShowtime

      @GetMapping("/booking/{showtimeId}") public String adminListBookingsByShowtime(@PathVariable("showtimeId") Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Displays bookings filtered by a specific showtime.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the showtime to filter bookings.
      model - Spring MVC model to add attributes for the view.
      redirectAttributes - RedirectAttributes for passing error messages.
      Returns:
      The view name "admin_booking" if showtime found, otherwise redirects to admin home.
